body:
Fix this horrible client i can't even load the home page

http://oi68.tinypic.com/2gu0dw6.jpg

replies.body: It looks like your client is having a hard time getting information from our servers. Most of the time we can get that cleared up by adjusting some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but let me know if that's not helping!
